body:
> tf-1.4 did't support cudnn7.0. Only for cudnn6.0.

I don't think this is the case as I built tensorflow 1.4.0 with CUDA 9.0, cuDNN v7 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS without any issues (specified CUDA and cuDNN versions when running the `configure` script, then ran `bazel build -c opt --action_env PATH="$PATH" //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package`).
